entry.title: Azure/intelligent-app-workshop
entry.summary: Immersive workshop showcasing the remarkable potential of integrating SoTA foundation models to enhance product experiences and streamline backend workflows. Leverages Microsoft's Copilot stack, Semantic Kernel and Azure primitives to offer an engaging and comprehensive introduction to AI-infused app development and deployment
